feed.title: Amagibaba
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive, and powerful Jekyll theme for presenting professional writing.

entry.title: How I Made This Site
entry.summary: This site was made using Jekyll and was incredibly easy to make. Literally no code at all, and super functional, beautiful, and modern. I started using the Chirpy Starter repo, following this awesome YouTube walkthrough by creator Techno Tim. He gives pretty much all the instructions, but here are some idiosyncrasies that you might face along the way and some tips to help you get started. Depe...
